name: Image Collecting
description:
This game is in early acess. 

In this game, you collect pictures to increase your score. But be carefull of the traps of the levels that it throws at you.

Only has one level for the time being

Instruction:

Arrow keys to move left, right, and jump. That 's it!

Hope you have a fun time.

Thanks for my friends and my sister for contributing for the images. Thank you very much!
